dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digits and is commonly used for training various image processing systems. It contains 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is widely used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
I. Sutskever
G. E. Hinton
dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large visual database designed for use in visual object recognition software research. It contains millions of images across thousands of categories.
dcterms:title: ImageNet
